course_name: Critical Thinking and Scientific Writing in Animal and Veterinary Biosciences
description: The content of the course will depend on the area of study selected and the format of the study negotiated with the Honours advisors. You can expect to study a number of issues as core content which can be presented using one or more teaching methods including but not limited to, lectures, seminars, group discussions, case studies, collating and reviewing the literature and other self directed learning.
